Title: Friends in Low Places
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Alex Regnery, Hartley Voss, Jordan Harrison (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: A new work detail doesn't go over well with the inmates. Judy seeks help from Poussey. Maria finds a place she can conduct business.
